title: Answer Product Warranty Question
description: A customer wants to know the warranty period for an electronic device they are considering buying.

tasks.description: Retrieve the warranty information from the product's specifications or a dedicated warranty knowledge base.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the product has a '2-Year Manufacturer Warranty'.

tasks.description: Clearly communicate the warranty terms to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a correct and clear answer.
